Content: <font color='#FFCE58'>Fear, Madness, and Sleep are cleansed from encouraged allies.</font>
<font color='#F19824'>If the target is disabled, deal an additional [SkillDamage:Projectile_LLWEAPONEX_MasteryBonus_CripplingBlowPiercingDamage].</font>
<font color='#F19824'>Deal an additional [1] in a [2]m radius around the target.</font>

<font color='#F19824'>Sunder the armor of hit targets, reducing max <font color='#AE9F95'>[Handle:h161d5479g06d6g408egade2g37a203e3361f:Physical Armour]</font>/<font color='#4197E2'>[Handle:h50eb8e33g82edg412eg9886gec19ca591254:Magic Armour]</font> by <font color='#AE9F95'>[Stats:Stats_LLWEAPONEX_MasteryBonus_Sunder:ArmorBoost]%</font>/<font color='#4197E2'>[Stats:Stats_LLWEAPONEX_MasteryBonus_Sunder:MagicArmorBoost]%</font></font> for [ExtraData:LLWEAPONEX_MasteryBonus_CripplingBlow_SunderTurns] turn(s).</font>

<font color='#FF6624'>Targets hit deal <font color='#FF0000'>[1]% less damage</font> until their turn ends, while you deal <font color='#33FF00'>[2]% more damage to them</font> until your turn ends.</font>
<font color='#9BF0FF'>Targets hit become weak to your weapon's element, gaining [Special] for [ExtraData:LLWEAPONEX_MasteryBonus_ElementalWeaknessTurns] turn(s).</font>

Disabled - Your current weapon(s) deal no elemental damage.
Targets hit become weak to your weapon's element for [ExtraData:LLWEAPONEX_MasteryBonus_ElementalWeaknessTurns] turn(s).

<font color='#CC33FF'>Allies standing on <font color='#F13324'>blood surfaces</font> or in <font color='#F13324'>blood clouds</font> gain a <font color='#33FF00'>[Stats:Stats_LLWEAPONEX_BloodEmpowered:DamageBoost]% damage bonus</font>.</font>

<font color='#FFCE58'>Slam the target with your palm, knocking them back <font color='#33FF00'>[ExtraData:LLWEAPONEX_MasteryBonus_PetrifyingTouch_KnockbackDistance]m</font> and dealing [SkillDamage:Projectile_LLWEAPONEX_MasteryBonus_PetrifyingTouchBonusDamage].</font>
Damage from the next direct hit taken is reduced by <font color='#33FF00'>[ExtraData:LLWEAPONEX_MasteryBonus_RecoverArmour_DamageReduction]%</font>.

Become a thundering force of will when rushing, <font color='#FFCE58'>knocking enemies aside</font> with a <font color='#F19824'>[ExtraData:LLWEAPONEX_MasteryBonus_RushDizzyChance]% chance to apply Dizzy for [ExtraData:LLWEAPONEX_MasteryBonus_RushDizzyTurns] turn(s)</font>.

If under the effects of <font color='#FFCE58'>War Charge</font>, deal <font color='#33FF00'>[ExtraData:LLWEAPONEX_MasteryBonus_WarChargeDamageBoost]% more damage on hit</font> and gain <font color='#7D71D9'>[Key:HASTED_DisplayName]</font> after rushing.

<font color='#F19824'>The knife thrown has a <font color='#CC33FF'>[ExtraData:LLWEAPONEX_MasteryBonus_ThrowingKnife_Chance]%</font> to be <font color='#00FFAA'>coated in poison or explosive oil</font>, dealing [SkillDamage:Projectile_LLWEAPONEX_DaggerMastery_ThrowingKnife_Explosive] or [SkillDamage:Projectile_LLWEAPONEX_DaggerMastery_ThrowingKnife_Poison] on hit.</font>

Each target hit becomes Vulnerable. If hit again, Vulnerable is removed and the target takes [SkillDamage:Projectile_LLWEAPONEX_MasteryBonus_VulnerableDamage].
Vulnerable is removed when your turn ends.

<font color='#F19824'>While spinning, shoot [ExtraData:LLWEAPONEX_MasteryBonus_Whirlwind_HandCrossbow_MinTargets]-[ExtraData:LLWEAPONEX_MasteryBonus_Whirlwind_HandCrossbow_MaxTargets] enemies in a [Stats:Projectile_LLWEAPONEX_MasteryBonus_Whirlwind_HandCrossbow_FindTarget:ExplodeRadius]m radius, dealing [SkillDamage:Projectile_LLWEAPONEX_MasteryBonus_Whirlwind_HandCrossbow_Shoot:LLWEAPONEX_HandCrossbow_ShootDamage].</font>

<font color='#DC143C'>Rupture</font> the wounds of <font color='#FF0000'>Bleeding</font> targets, dealing [SkillDamage:Projectile_LLWEAPONEX_MasteryBonus_WhirlwindRuptureBleeding] for each turn of <font color='#FF0000'>Bleeding</font> remaining.

Gain a follow-up combo skill ([Key:Target_LLWEAPONEX_Rapier_SuckerCombo1_DisplayName]) after punching a target.
[ExtraData:LLWEAPONEX_MasteryBonus_SuckerPunch_KnockdownTurnExtensionChance]% chance to increase Knockdown by 1 turn.
Gain hyper-focus, increasing the <font color='#33FF00'>damage of the next shot of your pistol by [ExtraData:LLWEAPONEX_MasteryBonus_Adrenaline_PistolDamageBoost]%</font>.

While in combat, automatically apply [Key:MARKED_DisplayName] to [ExtraData:LLWEAPONEX_MasteryBonus_TacticalRetreat_MaxMarkedTargets] enemies in a [ExtraData:LLWEAPONEX_MasteryBonus_TacticalRetreat_MarkingRadius]m radius when jumping away.

Automatically reload your pistol when jumping.
When landing, apply [Key:MARKED_DisplayName] to the closest enemy within [ExtraData:LLWEAPONEX_MasteryBonus_CloakAndDagger_MarkingRadius]m ([ExtraData:LLWEAPONEX_MasteryBonus_CloakAndDagger_MaxMarkedTargets] target(s) max).
Shooting targets [Key:MARKED_DisplayName] this way, with your pistol, guarantees one critical hit until you end your turn.
